## DynamicControl interface

Describes the rendering, value and validation of an form control

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DynamicControl<TForm, TFormState = {}> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [asyncStateValidators?](./dynamic-forms.dynamiccontrol.asyncstatevalidators.md) | [AsyncStateValidator](./dynamic-forms.asyncstatevalidator.md)<!-- -->&lt;unknown&gt;\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> Async state validators for the control value |
|  [name](./dynamic-forms.dynamiccontrol.name.md) | Extract&lt;keyof TForm, string&gt; | The name of the control |
|  [questions?](./dynamic-forms.dynamiccontrol.questions.md) | [QuestionWrapper](./dynamic-forms.questionwrapper.md)<!-- -->\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> The questions that can set the control value |
|  [required?](./dynamic-forms.dynamiccontrol.required.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Set to true to require a value before the form can be submitted |
|  [type](./dynamic-forms.dynamiccontrol.type.md) | "control" | The type of control |
|  [validators?](./dynamic-forms.dynamiccontrol.validators.md) | ValidatorFn\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> Validators for the control value |
|  [valueGetter?](./dynamic-forms.dynamiccontrol.valuegetter.md) | ((form: Immutable&lt;TForm&gt;) =&gt; unknown) \| unknown | <i>(Optional)</i> The value of the control either as static value or a function of form value |
